netfilter: nf_tables: reject duplicate device on updates
fs/ntfs3: Add sanity check for file name
smb3: fix for slab out of bounds on mount to ksmbd
f2fs: vm_unmap_ram() may be called from an invalid context
wifi: ath11k: fix sleeping-in-atomic in ath11k_mac_op_set_bitrate_mask()
NFS: Fix filehandle bounds checking in nfs_fh_to_dentry()
PCI: endpoint: Fix configfs group list head handling
rcutorture: Fix rcutorture_one_extend_check() splat in RT kernels
fs: Prevent file descriptor table allocations exceeding INT_MAX
scsi: ufs: exynos: Fix programming of HCI_UTRL_NEXUS_TYPE
parisc: Drop WARN_ON_ONCE() from flush_cache_vmap
usb: core: config: Prevent OOB read in SS endpoint companion parsing
RDMA/siw: Fix the sendmsg byte count in siw_tcp_sendpages
netfilter: ctnetlink: remove refcounting in expectation dumpers
gfs2: Set .migrate_folio in gfs2_{rgrp,meta}_aops
rcu: Protect ->defer_qs_iw_pending from data race
btrfs: subpage: keep TOWRITE tag until folio is cleaned
mm/kmemleak: avoid deadlock by moving pr_warn() outside kmemleak_lock
mm/smaps: fix race between smaps_hugetlb_range and migration
drm/amd/display: add null check
iommu/arm-smmu-qcom: Add SM6115 MDSS compatible
net: bridge: fix soft lockup in br_multicast_query_expired()
wifi: ath12k: Correct tid cleanup when tid setup fails
wifi: ath10k: shutdown driver when hardware is unreliable
LoongArch: Optimize module load time by optimizing PLT/GOT counting
ALSA: hda/ca0132: Fix buffer overflow in add_tuning_control
drm/msm: Add error handling for krealloc in metadata setup
crypto: x86/aegis - Add missing error checks
btrfs: qgroup: fix race between quota disable and quota rescan ioctl
bpf: Forget ranges when refining tnum after JSET
soc: qcom: mdt_loader: Ensure we don't read past the ELF header
ARM: rockchip: fix kernel hang during smp initialization
ACPI: APEI: send SIGBUS to current task if synchronous memory error not recovered
wifi: ath12k: Decrement TID on RX peer frag setup error handling
RDMA: hfi1: fix possible divide-by-zero in find_hw_thread_mask()
jfs: truncate good inode pages when hard link is 0
ALSA: usb-audio: Validate UAC3 cluster segment descriptors
net/sched: Make cake_enqueue return NET_XMIT_CN when past buffer_limit
bus: mhi: host: Detect events pointing to unexpected TREs
x86/vmscape: Add conditional IBPB mitigation
drm/hisilicon/hibmc: fix the hibmc loaded failed bug
btrfs: do not allow relocation of partially dropped subvolumes
mm/debug_vm_pgtable: clear page table entries at destroy_args()
mm/kmemleak: avoid soft lockup in __kmemleak_do_cleanup()
rcu: Fix rcu_read_unlock() deadloop due to IRQ work
Out of bounds read for cookie path
Malicious Key Exchange Messages may Lead to Excessive Resource Consumption
fs/smb: Fix inconsistent refcnt update
ftrace: Fix potential warning in trace_printk_seq during ftrace_dump
smb: client: fix race with concurrent opens in rename(2)
atm: atmtcp: Prevent arbitrary write in atmtcp_recv_control().
net: rose: include node references in rose_neigh refcount
trace/fgraph: Fix the warning caused by missing unregister notifier
net: macb: fix unregister_netdev call order in macb_remove()
HID: hid-ntrig: fix unable to handle page fault in ntrig_report_version()
sctp: initialize more fields in sctp_v6_from_sk()
mISDN: hfcpci: Fix warning when deleting uninitialized timer
KVM: x86: use array_index_nospec with indices that come from guest
HID: asus: fix UAF via HID_CLAIMED_INPUT validation
batman-adv: fix OOB read/write in network-coding decode
i40e: Fix potential invalid access when MAC list is empty
ocfs2: prevent release journal inode after journal shutdown
scsi: lpfc: Fix buffer free/clear order in deferred receive path
ppp: fix memory leak in pad_compress_skb
wifi: brcmfmac: fix use-after-free when rescheduling brcmf_btcoex_info work
vxlan: Fix NPD in {arp,neigh}_reduce() when using nexthop objects
ptp: ocp: fix use-after-free bugs causing by ptp_ocp_watchdog
Bluetooth: vhci: Prevent use-after-free by removing debugfs files early
wifi: cfg80211: fix use-after-free in cmp_bss()
fs: writeback: fix use-after-free in __mark_inode_dirty()
pcmcia: Fix a NULL pointer dereference in __iodyn_find_io_region()
REXML has a DoS condition when parsing malformed XML file
Kata Containers coco-tdx malicious host can circumvent initdata verification
Fallback tar extraction in pip doesn't check symbolic links point to extraction directory
Squid through 7.1 mishandles ASN.1 encoding of long SNMP OIDs. This occurs in asn_build_objid in lib/snmplib/asn1.c.
Glib-networking: uninitialized memory dereferences on glib-networking through glib-networking/tls/openssl/gtlsbio.c via g_tls_bio_new_from_iostream() and g_tls_bio_new_from_datagram_based()
In PyTorch through 2.6.0, when eager is used, nn.PairwiseDistance(p=2) produces incorrect results.
Glib: buffer under-read on glib through glib/gfileutils.c via get_tmp_file()
iommufd: Prevent ALIGN() overflow
sctp: linearize cloned gso packets in sctp_rcv
LoongArch: BPF: Fix jump offset calculation in tailcall
fbdev: Fix vmalloc out-of-bounds write in fast_imageblit
MIPS: Don't crash in stack_top() for tasks without ABI or vDSO
pNFS: Fix uninited ptr deref in block/scsi layout
ALSA: usb-audio: Validate UAC3 power domain descriptors, too
media: uvcvideo: Fix 1-byte out-of-bounds read in uvc_parse_format()
gfs2: Validate i_depth for exhash directories
loop: Avoid updating block size under exclusive owner
mm/ptdump: take the memory hotplug lock inside ptdump_walk_pgd()
scsi: lpfc: Check for hdwq null ptr when cleaning up lpfc_vport structure
jfs: Regular file corruption check
drbd: add missing kref_get in handle_write_conflicts
hfs: fix slab-out-of-bounds in hfs_bnode_read()
io_uring/net: commit partial buffers on retry
hfsplus: fix slab-out-of-bounds in hfsplus_bnode_read()
jfs: upper bound check of tree index in dbAllocAG
net/sched: ets: use old 'nbands' while purging unused classes
hfs: fix general protection fault in hfs_find_init()
scsi: bfa: Double-free fix
drm/amd/pm: fix null pointer access
nfsd: handle get_client_locked() failure in nfsd4_setclientid_confirm()
fbdev: fix potential buffer overflow in do_register_framebuffer()
comedi: fix race between polling and detaching
media: venus: Fix OOB read due to missing payload bound check
hfsplus: don't use BUG_ON() in hfsplus_create_attributes_file()
netfilter: ctnetlink: fix refcount leak on table dump

cJSON 1.5.0 through 1.7.18 allows out-of-bounds access via the decode_array_index_from_pointer function in cJSON_Utils.c, allowing remote attackers to bypass array bounds checking and access restricted data via malformed JSON pointer strings containing alphanumeric characters.
